title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync (1GILQD5)
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out-of-sync message is displayed when attempting to overwrite the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should not cause an out-of-sync message when overwriting it in the same directory.
SR:
1. Open the project directory
2. Export the directory as a jar file
3. Place the exported jar file back into the project directory
4. Attempt to overwrite the exported jar file for the second time
5. Observe if an out-of-sync message is displayed
